gems.text:
The Initiative for Digital Public Infrastructure studies, imagines and builds a new, more resilient Internet for the public good; an Internet guided by the values of users and their communities rather than those of corporations and investors.
https://publicinfrastructure.org/

metalink.description: We’re imagining, studying, and building public spaces and public goods on the internet. Listen to our podcast,Reimagining the Internet. Read the latest articles written by members of the Initiative team. Learn about the research we’re conducting at iDPI. What is Digital Public Infrastructure? The In…
metalink.title: Home - Initiative for Digital Public Infrastructure

gems.text:
Daniel Schmachtenberger interview on mitigating natural and human-caused existential risks and designing post-capitalist systems. This 2017 interview Daniel attempts to explain how as a product of nature are driven to transcend simple metrics.  

“If you’re scaling towards the power of gods, then you have to have the wisdom and the love of gods, or you’ll self destruct. ”

https://podcasts.google.com/feed/aHR0cHM6Ly9mdXR1cmV0aGlua2Vycy5saWJzeW4uY29tL3Jzcw/episode/ZGEwODgwNTEzYzg1MWEzMDY0NzMyZWE0YmQ3OWZiMjA

metalink.description: Daniel Schmachtenberger interview on mitigating natural and human-caused existential risks and designing post-capitalist systems. Show notes: http://futurethinkers.org/46 Listen to previous episodes with Daniel Schmachtenberger: http://futurethinkers.org/daniel…
metalink.title: Future Thinkers - Daniel Schmachtenberger - The Existential Game
